short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically gather and export suggested keywords for SEO and content strategies, with deep suggestion functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Keyword Scouter - Streamline Your SEO Keyword Research

Unlock the full potential of your SEO strategy with automated keyword extraction, advanced research algorithms, and Google Trends insights. Experience powerful features designed to optimize your SEO and content marketing efforts.

Perfect for SEO professionals, digital marketers, and content creators, the Keyword Scouter Chrome extension automates the keyword discovery process, extracting "People Also Search For" keywords directly from Google to refine your SEO strategy with ease.

🎯 Key Benefits:

🔍 Automated Keyword Extraction
Extract all "People Also Search For" and suggested keywords directly from Google search results, saving you valuable time and effort.

📊 Google Lookup for Each Keyword
Instantly perform Google searches based on extracted keywords directly from the extension.

📈 Google Trends Integration
Track the performance of each keyword in real-time, helping you analyze trends and refine your strategy.

📂 Download Keywords with URLs
Download all extracted keywords with their Google search query URLs and Google Trends result URLs for further analysis.

🧠 Advanced Research Algorithm
Access deeper insights with additional keyword suggestions using our proprietary research algorithm. Check out the screenshot above on how the deep suggestion actually works.

📋 Copy Keywords Instantly
Easily copy entire keyword lists with a single click to streamline your workflow.

🔐 Privacy-First Approach
All your research data stays private — none of it is stored on our servers, ensuring full control and security over your information.

🖥️ Seamless Browser Integration
The extension integrates directly into Google search pages, delivering keyword insights as you browse without interruptions.

Disclaimer: This extension is independently developed and is not affiliated with Google or any search engine platform.
